CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 30, 1954, pg. 1, reads: "Without at Home - The family of Lacey and Ruth Bruce was among those who lost their home and possessions Saturday when a fire, which left seven families seeking shelter with relatives or friends, roared through the 1500 block of North Murtland Street. Left to right, front: Lacey Jr., Gloria, Mrs. Bruce, and Lacey Sr., who is holding the couple's daughter Carol.  Standing, back row: Phyllis, Janet, and Ina Bruce. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Bruce family after losing their Homewood home on North Murtland Street to fire, front row: Lacey Jr., Gloria, Ruth, Lacey Bruce Sr. holding baby Carol; back row: Phyllis, Janet, and Ina Bruce, posed around staircase with stained glass window in background
